text: Hagi ana mana nantera oti'za eka eka kupi zogi ante'za, mago have tra ante'neza mago havenu atufe'za vu'za eza nehazageno refuzafupeno ta'nefa sege, magru riga onaginefi rentra hazageno tanefa asege'za kavofi krete'za, kuta keki tro hu'naze. Haga'amo'a olivi masavempi kre'naza kekimofo haga gna hu'ne.
